pullRequest.body:
This PR accompanies #11246, squeezing some non-terminal `simp`s highlighted by the linter until I decided to stop!

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

nodes.body:
Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/924d720c-9d33-48a1-a00b-a83f05b2e075) for commit 3d2d08a2caee7a7f8c2d82b4783344de1d5dcde5.
There were [no significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/19cf993e-4a71-42c2-abe4-da3c01976643/to/924d720c-9d33-48a1-a00b-a83f05b2e075) against commit 0c4cb8258e108d73ac220401bfeb99f04f90182b.

Can you address the small comment first? 

bors delegate+

:v: adomani can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8209558916/job/22455338349)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8209558916/job/22455337792)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8209558916/job/22455337948)
Can you fit a `<;> simp` onto the previous line?
I could, exploiting that Lean accepts `.trans` for `Eq.trans`!

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore: squeeze some non-terminal simps
